sample_queries.query: select patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, gender, phone_number, email, address from public.patients;
select record_id, patient_id, visit_date, diagnosis, treatment, doctor_name, notes from medical_records;
select species, island, bill_length_mm, bill_depth_mm, flipper_length_mm, body_mass_g, sex, year from penguins;
select passenger_id, survived, pclass, name, sex, age, sib_sp, parch, ticket, fare, cabin, embarked from titanic_train;
